headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SPELMAN, LAURENCE A.

snippet: SPELMAN--Laurence A.,retired New York attorney, died Sunday, January 31, at his home in Sarasota, FL. He was 87. He leaves his devoted wife Dorothy; sister Marcia and husband Burt de Fren; daughter Erika; son Paul and his wife Erin; grandchildren Emily Figueroa, Jeremy, Billy and Janie Spelman. He was a graduate of Columbia College and Law School and NYU (LLM). Spelman was associated with Davis Polk Wardwell and later was a partner at Robinson Silverman, et al. where he specialized in estates and matrimonial law. He was a member of the New York and Florida bars. He played the banjo, and loved sports, jazz, theatre and classical music. He also loved to regale friends with songs and poetry. His life will be celebrated in March in Sarasota, Florida. 1/3
